description:
http://anidb.net/ch114428 [Six]`s crew is tasked with the toughest job in the army: battling the forces of Heine of the flame. She`s a powerful enemy, but when he gets the upper hand, there`s no limits to how far he`ll go… 
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Aku no Kanbu no Taoshi Kata
How to Defeat an Evil Leader
